text: Nayo abasenga abatari Imana y’ukuri ataco badashobora kubagirira inabi iyariyo yose canke kubagirira akamaro akariko kwose, nabo bakavuga bati:- abo nibo badusabira imbere y’Imana yacu, wewe vuga uti:- mbega mubwira Imana itazi ibiri mw’ijuru canke kw’isi? Rero iri kure n’ukutishobora kwayo kandi iri n’iteka rihagije nabo bayigereranya n’ibindi bintu
